name: Intel Queue Cards
description: 9 iterations on the Needs Attention queue card — exploring scannability, signal clarity, action affordance, and accessible encoding

versions.notes: Signal-Led — lead with what's wrong, company is context
REJECTED — Severity Edge bar felt heavy and reductive
Signal Grid — 3x2 micro-grid showing all 6 signals as colored dots
Action-Forward — suggested next action as headline, contextual CTA buttons
Compact Two-Line — max density, severity badge, expandable for detail
SYNTHESIS: Full Narrative — signal headline + enhanced 6-col grid with values + contextual actions, all visible
SYNTHESIS: Collapse/Expand — compact with inline health dots, expands to signal detail rows + actions
Accessible Signal Bar — V8a: icons inside dots (!/▲/✓/?), V8b: tinted columns with simple dots + text values
RESEARCH-INFORMED: Segment bars for cadence (Sentry-style), two-density encoding (problem=loud, healthy=quiet), text labels replace dots (Carbon 3-of-4)
